content:
Let me check the full session history to see if your messages are there but just not showing up in my view.

There's a technical issue — I can't access the full session history right now (gateway connection error). That explains why I'm not seeing your messages even though you can see them.

**The most reliable fix:**

Save the PRD directly to the workspace:

1. Open your file manager
2. Navigate to: `[REDACTED_PATH]`
3. Save the PRD there (any name: `mirari-prd.md`, `prd.txt`, whatever)
4. Tell me the filename

That bypasses the chat completely — I'll read it straight from disk. Should take 30 seconds and we'll be unblocked.

Want to try that?
